Rationale.RP1_ImplementationReconstructability: The experiment can be fully reconstructed from plan.md and CodeWalkthrough.md. The plan clearly describes the hypothesis (LRE approximation), methodology (Jacobian-based estimation), and evaluation metrics (faithfulness and causality). Demo notebooks provide complete working examples. No major guesswork required.
Rationale.RP2_EnvironmentReproducibility: Environment successfully restored: requirements.txt lists all dependencies, baukit installs from GitHub, all imports work correctly, GPT-2-XL loads from HuggingFace, no version conflicts encountered. Python 3.10+ requirement is met.
Rationale.RP3_DeterminismAndStability: Seeds properly set using set_seed(12345) as demonstrated in demo notebooks. Results are stable across runs. The repository explicitly handles random seed setting through experiment_utils.set_seed(). Replicated results match between script and notebook execution.
Rationale.RP4_DemoPresentation: Repository provides comprehensive demos: demo/demo.ipynb demonstrates complete LRE workflow including faithfulness and causality evaluation; demo/attribute_lens.ipynb demonstrates Attribute Lens application. Demos executable without external materials, all inputs and configurations specified, outputs match expected behavior.
